trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered> event can be canceled by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered> evento pode ser cancelado, definindo a <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> propriedade `true`.

trans-unit.source: However, if the event is cancelled, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A> will not change to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se o evento é cancelado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A> não será alterado para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A> valor.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse tipo.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar relatórios sobre vários eventos ou eventos que ocorrem com frequência, considere substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> com <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou anexar a mensagem como um multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> named `ListView1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> chamado `ListView1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered> evento.

trans-unit.source: The previous display position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: A posição de exibição anterior do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: The new display position for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: A nova posição de exibição do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> that is being reordered.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> que está sendo reordenado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> that is being reordered.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> que está sendo reordenado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> that is being reordered.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> que está sendo reordenado.
